title: School Reopening Notice
content: We are pleased to announce that the school will reopen on March 1, 2025. Please check your emails for further instructions.

title: Examination Schedule Released
content: The examination schedule for the upcoming term has been released. Please refer to the notice for details and timings.

title: Holiday Announcement
content: A holiday has been declared on April 1, 2025, due to regional festivities. Kindly plan your academic activities accordingly.

title: Parent-Teacher Meeting
content: The next parent-teacher meeting is scheduled for March 15, 2025. Parents are requested to attend and discuss their child's progress.

title: Library Book Submission Reminder
content: Students are reminded to return their borrowed library books by March 5, 2025, to avoid late fines.

title: Sports Day Announcement
content: The annual sports day will be held on March 20, 2025. Students are encouraged to participate in various events.

title: Science Fair Registration Open
content: Registrations for the annual Science Fair are now open. Interested students should register by March 12, 2025.

title: School Picnic
content: A school picnic is planned for March 25, 2025. Students must submit their consent forms by March 15, 2025.

title: New School Uniform Guidelines
content: Starting April 2025, new uniform guidelines will be implemented. Please check the school website for details.

title: Summer Vacation Dates Announced
content: Summer vacations will begin on May 15, 2025, and end on June 30, 2025. Have a great break!
